data.text: @54seventeen @lawproflain @Jews4Abolition @AbolitionAshley @KarineOmry @DPInfoCtr @DeathPenaltyAct @jettica65 @TheCollectiveD1 @thewoodsfdn @DeathPenaltyWW @kelleyjhenry There is a point question here  any honest pro death penalty person has to answer. The question is “what is an acceptable false positive rate?”. Is that rate achievable while still having a death penalty?

@54seventeen @Jews4Abolition @AbolitionAshley @KarineOmry @DPInfoCtr @DeathPenaltyAct @jettica65 @TheCollectiveD1 @thewoodsfdn @DeathPenaltyWW @kelleyjhenry Doc! You have the intestinal fortitude to take your cause to the next evolutionary tier.A organized march on Washington.
